extracted_playbook.title: Implement Strong Password Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Use strong, unique passwords for different accounts, especially for email. Avoid password reuse across multiple services.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Use multi-factor authentication (2FA/2SV) to reduce the impact of password compromises.

extracted_playbook.title: Keep Devices and Networks Updated
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure devices and networks are protected by using the latest supported versions, applying security updates promptly, and using anti-virus software to scan regularly for malware threats.

extracted_playbook.title: Exercise Vigilance Against Spearphishing
extracted_playbook.description: Be cautious of spearphishing emails. Verify the legitimacy of suspicious emails through other means and be wary of emails from unexpected addresses.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Automated Email Scanning
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that your email provider's automated email scanning features are enabled to detect malicious content.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable or Monitor Mail-Forwarding
extracted_playbook.description: Disable mail-forwarding to prevent attackers from maintaining visibility of target emails. If disabling is not possible, regularly monitor settings to ensure no unauthorized forwarding rules are set.
